summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Pine Street from Evergreen Place to Madrona Drive; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the reconstruction of pedestrian bridge; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15218 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
